title: Naked Cowboy Switches From Briefs To Boxers
teaser: New York City's Robert Burck is a Times Square street performer known as the Naked Cowboy. He performs wearing a guitar, 10-gallon hat, cowboy boots and white briefs. On Tuesday, he changes to boxers.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
